models.name: 28mm wargame tabletop pipe system for 3/4 inch PVC pipes
models.description:
This is a tabletop pipe system for wargaming.

Supports are a must!

These couplings and bends fit 3/4 inch PVC pipe.  I've printed everything but the 4 way connector at this point and they all work well.  Since the 4 way is a remix of the others, it will be fine.

They are not fancy, but they work well enough on the table. 

I'm looking at a catwalk system that would connect between the pipe supports.  I'll publish if or when I come up with something I like.

If you like these and have any suggestions or constructive criticism, please comment.


This thing was made with Tinkercad. Edit it online https://www.tinkercad.com/things/2lTpsIEjK9J

models.name: Snowflake - 127
models.description:
Customized version of http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:1159436

Created with Customizer! http://www.thingiverse.com/apps/customizer/run?thing_id=1159436
models.instructions:
Using the following options:

holeRadius = 2
sharp = 5
random_seed = 8675309
plate_diameter = 233
target_diameter = 100
rotateAngle = 0
loopRadius = 4
organic = 3
steps = 6
scaleFactor = 1
fuzzy = 5
show_plate_circle = no
branchy = 11
loop = yes
show_target_circle = yes
wide = 5
thickness = 1
fat = 5
nozzle = .4
ringed = 5
custom_seed = 59
long = 5
full = 6

models.name: Adapter for 1/2-13 bolt to 6 mm flexible coupler
models.description: This is an adapter I made to mate a 1/2"-13 bolt to a flexible coupler so that I could then attach a Hall effect sensor to the other side of the coupler and have it turn concentrically with the bolt. I'm using it on a homemade motion simulator, but it might have other applications.
models.description_html: This is an adapter I made to mate a 1/2"-13 bolt to a flexible coupler so that I could then attach a Hall effect sensor to the other side of the coupler and have it turn concentrically with the bolt. I'm using it on a homemade motion simulator, but it might have other applications.
models.details:
Summary

This is an adapter I made to mate a 1/2"-13 bolt to a flexible coupler so that I could then attach a Hall effect sensor to the other side of the coupler and have it turn concentrically with the bolt. I'm using it on a homemade motion simulator, but it might have other applications.

Print Settings

Printer:

Creality CR-10S5

Rafts:

No

Supports:

No

Resolution:

0.15 mm

Infill:

15%

Post-Printing

Glue the two halves together after printing.

data.content: This is an adapter I made to mate a 1/2"-13 bolt to a flexible coupler so that I could then attach a Hall effect sensor to the other side of the coupler and have it turn concentrically with the bolt. I'm using it on a homemade motion simulator, but it might have other applications.
Glue the two halves together after printing.

models.name: Holder for 3 water bottles
models.description:
I needed something to clip 3 bottles (1L) of water together, so they can act as a counterweight for my  [ice bucket rope roll](http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:948768).  

It works, but it should be improved.
